UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Mechanism of Action and Therapeutic Potential of the β-Hairpin Antimicrobial Peptide Capitellacin from the Marine Polychaeta Capitella teleta
Literature.Author: Safronova VN, Panteleev PV, Sukhanov SV, Toropygin IY, Bolosov IA, Ovchinnikova TV

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus VKM B-1314(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus 209P(MIC=2µM),Bacillus subtilis VKM B-886(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=0.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.25µM),Escherichia coli 214(MIC=0.25µM),Enterobacter cloacae 4172(MIC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 2675(MIC=0.125µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=4µM)
